title: Aces and Kings: Inside Stories and Million-Dollar Strategies from Poker's Greatest Players
description: A colorful look inside the world of high-stakes poker charts the history and development of poker and offers profiles of some of the game's top players--including Doyle Brunson, "Amarillo Slim" Preston, and Chris Moneymaker--and their personal insights, how-to advice, and professional tips on how they win.
author: Michael Kaplan
